meanings.definition: A village development committee (VDC) in the Udayapur District of Province No. 1 in south-eastern Nepal.
meanings.english_definition: A former village development committee (VDC) in Udayapur District, Province No. 1, Nepal; now part of a municipality.

examples.sentence: Budukha VDC was merged into Katari Municipality in 2015.
examples.translation: ブドゥカ村落開発委員会は2015年にカタリ市に合併されました。

etymology.value: Likely derived from local language or dialect.
